    About 👋

    Machine Learning Playground was created by Mrityunjay Bhardwaj while going through several ML Books such as ESL, PRML,Goodfellow et al etc. The goal of this website is to make machine learning a bit more accessible through interactive visualizations (designed using Mike Bostock’s JavaScript library D3.js).

    Acknowledgements 🙏

    This website is built using this jekyll theme and is heavily Inspired by websites like Seeing Theory, distill.pub, satosa and many more.
